snippet: The United Nations human rights office said Iran was engaging in a broad pattern of arrests and actions against journalists and human rights advocates.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations human rights office said Iran was engaging in a broad pattern of arrests and actions against journalists and human rights advocates.

headline.seo: Iran Engaged in ‘Severe Clampdown’ on Critics, U.N. Says
headline.main: Iran Engaged in ‘Severe Clampdown’ on Critics, U.N. Says
headline.print_headline: Iran Engaged in ‘Severe Clampdown’ on Critics, U.N. Says
